I may be wrong but I believe that they had jurisdiction over all 
criminal activity in t heir patrol zones. Kyoto was broken up into quite 
a few patrol districts by group--Shinsengumi, Mimiwarigumi, Shoshidai 
etc and each had their "zones". We  have a color coded map in the files 
section of the main SHQ list (last row bottom of page)
http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/lst


-- 
Barbara Sheridan
